products.title: Roma, Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The snowy white of the roma pure is fresh and cool, allowing plenty of light in from outside, yet offering privacy and neutrality. The fabric is lightweight and durable, making it the ideal option for a blind that could get a lot of use. Light, airy living rooms make beautiful entertainment spaces, and this blind will only help to set that off. The soft hue won't clash in an all-white environment, and also creates an excellent colour break when teamed with bright colours such as emerald greens, poppy reds, and sky blues.

products.title: Richmond, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. The sleek, clean lines of the vertical blind complement the pattern perfectly, providing a handsome contrast between hard and soft. Place the pure in the bathroom, where its clean white hue will match a classic suite wonderfully. Keep the room bright and fresh by sticking to a one-colour palette, accenting only with silver fixtures and fittings for a contemporary feel.

products.title: Decor, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a stylish window arrangement, choose the dcor in pure, where a fusion of silk-inspired threads craft a modest blind with creative arcs and elevated stitching. This brilliantly white fabric rests on movable louvres to allow you to control the amount of light and ventilation entering the room. For a delicately stylish kitchen with fresh and reviving colour, match the stark pure with peaceful duck egg blue hues.

products.title: Henderson, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slightly raised stitching, the henderson pure displays subtle stripes on a smooth white canvas. The colour is a soft ice white with a clean and refreshing aesthetic and, hung in the vertical slats, looks streamlined and ordered. Hang the pure in your home office for a studious yet fresh look. Team with cool blues to continue the clean, contemporary theme, opting for light wooden furniture and floorboards, then adorning with throws, cushions, and accessories in subtle blues and whites.

products.title: Rochester, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The striking rochester in pure contains both brilliant, white shade and mesmerising adornments. The dreamy, satin-like threads create a fascinating display of contrasting textures, producing a classy look, with the added benefit of adjustable louvres to allow both ventilation and privacy. To create a serene haven with calming hues, present the pure in your restroom amidst a soothing setting of cornflower blue.

products.title: Roma, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Roma's pure filter blind is just that - pure, in the form a beautiful snow white. This lightly textured blind will allow light to trickle through whilst offering privacy and style when closed. But you can always use the adjustable louvres to open it, and let in all the light you want. Generate a clean and refreshing look in your bedroom by combining the pure with cool pastel blues or greens; or hang in a family bathroom alongside sea blues or soft aquas, and accessorise with silvers or golds depending on your preference.

products.title: Amor Icing Vertical Blind
products.description: The amor pure is the next shade up from the amor snowfall in terms of whiteness. In keeping with its name, the amor pure is that slightly off-white colour of paper or fluffy white cloud. All blinds in the amor range are 100% blackout so they are perfect for blocking out the light in a bedroom. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Gloss Pure Brilliant White Real Wood
products.description: The gloss range is the ultimate in sophistication; we have taken the timeless appearance of the wooden blind and given it a modern funky twist. This white gloss blind will add a stylish, fresh and crisp feel in any room in your home, the gloss finish adds an extra touch of chic. products.title: Turin 25mm Pure White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of turin 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This pure white perfect fit venetian blind adds a fresh white shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with bright accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are a drill-free and screw-free way to fit blinds to a upvc window or door - ensuring the frame warranty is protected.

products.title: Pure Black Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: This wooden blind is painted pure black and is a great choice for creating a statement at the window; the slats will draw attention to the window and the view beyond. The stark black slats will work well with all manner of interior designs from the traditional black and whit this wooden blind is painted pure black and is a great choice for creating a statement at the window; the slats will draw attention to the window and the view beyond.

products.title: Lusso, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The lusso pure features a distinct and enthralling texture that is sure to catch your eye and create a sophisticated scheme. This modest blind presents a soothing white shade that will blend perfectly into any scheme, whilst also featuring adjustable louvres which allow you versatile light control. Complement the pure with a frame of sumptuous linens in deep aubergine or soothing cornflower blue to create a contrasting casing to help to boost both the texture and brilliance of the blind.

products.title: Pure Black & White Wooden Blind With Tapes - 50mm Slat
products.description: This is a superb window blind for adding style, panache and drama; the black slats are transformed with tape in stark white for a striking contrast. This wooden blind will be a sensational addition to a tasteful home and if theres a room working a little mono-chrome style the this is a superb window blind for adding style, panache and drama; the black slats are transformed with tape in stark white for a striking contrast.

products.title: Amor White Lotus With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor white lotus and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Amor Washed Pebble With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. products.title: Pure Perfect Fit
products.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any white upvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Pure
products.description: The day & night woven pure roller blind features a light white colour that's both versatile and practical. The premium texture also helps to make this blind a stylish choice. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a charming addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Haze Pure Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The haze pure voile blind is a white sheer blind with a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in.

products.title: Gloss Taped Pure Brilliant White Real Wood
products.description: Their premium taped gloss pure white real wood blind features a sleek glossy finish, great for adding polished simplicity into a room. From soft creamy neutrals to trending greys and stone shades, this real wood range adds a modern sleek finish to your windows. A shade that never goes out of trend, this white wooden blind would adds a modern feel at a great price.
